title: HyperKAN: Kolmogorov-Arnold Networks make Hyperspectral Image Classificators Smarter
abstract: arXiv:2407.05278v2 Announce Type: replace  Abstract: In traditional neural network architectures, a multilayer perceptron (MLP) is typically employed as a classification block following the feature extraction stage. However, the Kolmogorov-Arnold Network (KAN) presents a promising alternative to MLP, offering the potential to enhance prediction accuracy.
